titleStmt.title: La France a monsievr De Brovssel, conseiller dv Roy en sa Covr de Parlement de Paris.
titleStmt.author: Pelletier, Pierre, fl. 1610.

notesStmt.note: Imprint conjectured; item bound in Thomason Tract collection with 'Le vray portraict du pere du peuple', which consists of this sonnet plus another, and which has similar typography.
Verse - "La plainte, grace aux Dieux ne m'est plus defenduë,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
